page.title: 15INDUSTRY - LOCAL
page.content:
Apart from farming and forestry, the main industries, two other operations are conducted within this area.
A. W. Blake operates, from Swaithwaite Head, a growing service industry of rental of agricultural equipment of all types to local farms. The main concern of Mr Blake, however, is in the repair, reclamation and refurbishment of agricultural machinery. This business has a wide market at present north of the border in Scotland.
Messrs. Tuer operate, nearby Blake's, a busy petrol filling station, with an equally busy servicing facility for cars, and smaller vehicles.
Both industries are essential in this area.
